sentences.en: A grudge has melted away as the ice.
sentences.cn: 仇隙冰消.

sentences.en: A grudge has not yet vanished.
sentences.cn: 嫌怨未消.

sentences.en: At a time like this, I don't grudge a thing.
sentences.cn: 在这样的时候, 我什么都舍得.

sentences.en: Bearing a grudge saps one's evergies and accomplishes abolutely nothing.
sentences.cn: 记仇会消耗自己的精力,使自己一事无成.

sentences.en: He appears to have a grudge against certain players.
sentences.cn: 他看来对某些选手怀恨在心。

sentences.en: He is not the kind of person to bear anyone a grudge.
sentences.cn: 他不是那种爱记仇的人.

sentences.en: He might have been murdered by a former client or someone harbouring a grudge.
sentences.cn: 他可能已经被以前的客户或某个对他怀恨在心的人谋杀了。

sentences.en: He still bore a grudge against her.
sentences.cn: 他对她有不满情绪.

sentences.en: I bear him no grudge .
sentences.cn: 我对他不怀任何积怨。

sentences.en: I do not grudge him his success.
sentences.cn: 我不嫉妒他的成功.

sentences.en: I grudge paying so much for such inferior goods.
sentences.cn: 我不愿花这么多钱买次品.

sentences.en: I was willing to settle my grudge with Harrison.
sentences.cn: 我原意解决我和哈里森的怨恨.

sentences.en: I’m not harbouring some secret grudge against you.
sentences.cn: 我没有对你暗地里怀恨在心。

sentences.en: It could be the work of someone with a grudge against the company.
sentences.cn: 这事可能是某些对公司怀有怨愤的人干的。

sentences.en: Mr Gillis was not normally a man to bear grudges .
sentences.cn: 吉利斯先生通常不是那种会积怨的人。

sentences.en: She owes me a grudge.
sentences.cn: 她对我怀有怨恨.

sentences.en: So I never grudge my love.
sentences.cn: 所以，我从不吝惜我的爱。

sentences.en: There are times when we would willingly give everything we possess to save our lives, yet we might grudge paying a surgeon a high fee for offering us precisely this service.
sentences.cn: 有时候我们心甘情愿地付出自己的一切财物以保全自己的生命, 但是外科医生正是为我们提供这种服务,我们却不肯多给他些医疗费.

sentences.en: This is something of a grudge match against a long-term enemy.
sentences.cn: 这可以说是一场与宿敌你死我活的比赛。

sentences.en: You let nasty little personal grudges creep in.
sentences.cn: 你就由着怨恨的情绪一点一点滋长。

words.tran_cn: 怀恨；吝惜；妒忌；不情愿做

trans.tran_en: a feeling of dislike for someone because you cannot forget that they harmed you in the past
to do or give something very unwillingly

trans.tran_cn: 怀恨，妒忌，吝惜，不情愿做
